mapper.select: SELECT HOUR(rental_datetime) AS label, COUNT(*) AS count FROM fast_reservation WHERE rental_datetime IS NOT NULL GROUP BY HOUR(rental_datetime) ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT HOUR(reservation_s_start_date) AS label, COUNT(*) AS count FROM short_reservation WHERE reservation_s_start_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY HOUR(reservation_s_start_date) ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT CONCAT(p.parking_province, ' ', p.parking_district) AS label, COUNT(*) AS count FROM fast_reservation fr JOIN parking p ON fr.rental_location = p.parking_id GROUP BY p.parking_province, p.parking_district ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT m.model_name AS label, COUNT(*) AS count FROM fast_reservation fr JOIN car c ON fr.car_id = c.car_id JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id GROUP BY m.model_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT m.model_name AS label, COUNT(*) AS count FROM short_reservation sr JOIN car c ON sr.car_id = c.car_id JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id GROUP BY m.model_name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5
